channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A Republican court candidate in North Carolina wants to toss out thousands of votes

item.title: What drives gold prices more: Supply or demand?
item.description: Both supply and demand can affect the price of gold. But which one drives prices higher? Here's what experts think.

item.title: 3.9 earthquake rocks Boston area

item.title: Belarus ruler claims landslide in 'sham' election
item.description: No credible opponents were allowed to run against Alexander Lukashenko, who has ruled Belarus since the 1990s.

item.title: TikTok loaded phones are selling for thousands online after momentary ban
item.description: Don't have TikTok on your phone? You can buy someone else's on eBay for thousands.

item.title: Thousands of Palestinians begin returning home to a devastated Gaza
item.description: The long trek home by Palestinians comes as mediators helped end twin crises over ceasefires in Gaza and Lebanon.

item.title: Earthquake felt in Boston was centered in Maine
item.description: An earthquake felt in Boston, Massachusetts Monday morning was centered in York Harbor, Maine.

item.title: Chinese AI chatbot DeepSeek sparks market turmoil
